title: AlphrToken
author: AlphrToken
content: Hello.It randomly caught my eye on the stock market.Its total supply is only 10 million units.There is only a supply of 450 thousand units in circulation on the stock exchange.The price is only 2 cents.Can you review Alphr token? Is it a good idea to buy?

comments.author: Cee2
comments.body: Can Alphr token be reviewed for an account called AlphrToken

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: At first I didn't understand what stock exchange they were talking about, but then I realized that it was probably the peculiarities of auto-translation. I looked at this token and I can say with certainty that it is a scam. The token dropped from $9 to $0.02 in a year. 99% loss in value suggests that the project was aimed at making money quickly. Most likely, the developers abandoned this project and started some other project, the purpose of which will also be to raise money, then a large token release to the market, price collapse and so on.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Cee2 on May 08, 2022, 05:12:54 PMCan Alphr token be reviewed for an account called AlphrToken   Nice catch.OP created an account to shill his token indirectlySpeaking of the shitcoin. It's going nowhere. It died a long time ago, once you look at the coinmarketcap chart.The 24 hours volume used to be in millions of dollars, but right now it's just $30K

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: AlphrToken on May 08, 2022, 04:31:14 PMCan you review Alphr token? Is it a good idea to buy?First, you ask to review your own token and try to shill here.Second, in crypto to see an opportunity, not only from the price, but from the product side, what product does your token offer?After I looked at your token website, I found out that the utility of your token is about copy-trade, I don't think this is a utility that will last long, besides I also know of a token with copy-trade utility and it's not growing. If you're asking if it's a good idea to buy $ALPHR tokens, my answer is NO.
